Description:
Detects binaries that use the same name as legitimate sysinternals tools to evade detection

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Binary Impersonating Sysinternals Tools
Query:
sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\accesschk.exe' or process_path like '%\accesschk64.exe' or process_path like '%\accessenum.exe' or process_path like '%\adexplorer.exe' or process_path like '%\adexplorer64.exe' or process_path like '%\adinsight.exe' or process_path like '%\adinsight64.exe' or process_path like '%\adrestore.exe' or process_path like '%\adrestore64.exe' or process_path like '%\autologon.exe' or process_path like '%\autologon64.exe' or process_path like '%\autoruns.exe' or process_path like '%\autoruns64.exe' or process_path like '%\autorunsc.exe' or process_path like '%\autorunsc64.exe' or process_path like '% ginfo.exe' or process_path like '% ginfo64.exe' or process_path like '%\cacheset.exe' or process_path like '%\cacheset64.exe' or process_path like '%\clockres.exe' or process_path like '%\clockres64.exe' or process_path like '%\contig.exe' or process_path like '%\contig64.exe' or process_path like '%\coreinfo.exe' or process_path like '%\coreinfo64.exe' or process_path like '%\cpustres.exe' or process_path like '%\cpustres64.exe' or process_path like '%\ctrl2cap.exe' or process_path like '%\dbgview.exe' or process_path like '%\dbgview64.exe' or process_path like '%\desktops.exe' or process_path like '%\desktops64.exe' or process_path like '%\disk2vhd.exe' or process_path like '%\disk2vhd64.exe' or process_path like '%\diskext.exe' or process_path like '%\diskext64.exe' or process_path like '%\diskmon.exe' or process_path like '%\diskmon64.exe' or process_path like '%\diskview.exe' or process_path like '%\diskview64.exe' or process_path like '%\du.exe' or process_path like '%\du64.exe' or process_path like '%\efsdump.exe' or process_path like '% indlinks.exe' or process_path like '% indlinks64.exe' or process_path like '%\handle.exe' or process_path like '%\handle64.exe' or process_path like '%\hex2dec.exe' or process_path like '%\hex2dec64.exe' or process_path like '%\junction.exe' or process_path like '%\junction64.exe' or process_path like '%\ldmdump.exe' or process_path like '%\listdlls.exe' or process_path like '%\listdlls64.exe' or process_path like '%\livekd.exe' or process_path like '%\livekd64.exe' or process_path like '%\loadord.exe' or process_path like '%\loadord64.exe' or process_path like '%\loadordc.exe' or process_path like '%\loadordc64.exe' or process_path like '%\logonsessions.exe' or process_path like '%\logonsessions64.exe' or process_path like '%\movefile.exe' or process_path like '%\movefile64.exe' or process_path like '%
otmyfault.exe' or process_path like '%
otmyfault64.exe' or process_path like '%
otmyfaultc.exe' or process_path like '%
otmyfaultc64.exe' or process_path like '%
tfsinfo.exe' or process_path like '%
tfsinfo64.exe' or process_path like '%\pendmoves.exe' or process_path like '%\pendmoves64.exe' or process_path like '%\pipelist.exe' or process_path like '%\pipelist64.exe' or process_path like '%\portmon.exe' or process_path like '%\procdump.exe' or process_path like '%\procdump64.exe' or process_path like '%\procexp.exe' or process_path like '%\procexp64.exe' or process_path like '%\procmon.exe' or process_path like '%\procmon64.exe' or process_path like '%\psexec.exe' or process_path like '%\psexec64.exe' or process_path like '%\psfile.exe' or process_path like '%\psfile64.exe' or process_path like '%\psgetsid.exe' or process_path like '%\psgetsid64.exe' or process_path like '%\psinfo.exe' or process_path like '%\psinfo64.exe' or process_path like '%\pskill.exe' or process_path like '%\pskill64.exe' or process_path like '%\pslist.exe' or process_path like '%\pslist64.exe' or process_path like '%\psloggedon.exe' or process_path like '%\psloggedon64.exe' or process_path like '%\psloglist.exe' or process_path like '%\psloglist64.exe' or process_path like '%\pspasswd.exe' or process_path like '%\pspasswd64.exe' or process_path like '%\psping.exe' or process_path like '%\psping64.exe' or process_path like '%\psservice.exe' or process_path like '%\psservice64.exe' or process_path like '%\psshutdown.exe' or process_path like '%\psshutdown64.exe' or process_path like '%\pssuspend.exe' or process_path like '%\pssuspend64.exe' or process_path like '%ammap.exe' or process_path like '%dcman.exe' or process_path like '%egdelnull.exe' or process_path like '%egdelnull64.exe' or process_path like '%egjump.exe' or process_path like '%u.exe' or process_path like '%u64.exe' or process_path like '%\sdelete.exe' or process_path like '%\sdelete64.exe' or process_path like '%\shareenum.exe' or process_path like '%\shareenum64.exe' or process_path like '%\shellrunas.exe' or process_path like '%\sigcheck.exe' or process_path like '%\sigcheck64.exe' or process_path like '%\streams.exe' or process_path like '%\streams64.exe' or process_path like '%\strings.exe' or process_path like '%\strings64.exe' or process_path like '%\sync.exe' or process_path like '%\sync64.exe' or process_path like '%\sysmon.exe' or process_path like '%\sysmon64.exe' or process_path like '%	cpvcon.exe' or process_path like '%	cpvcon64.exe' or process_path like '%	cpview.exe' or process_path like '%	cpview64.exe' or process_path like '%	estlimit.exe' or process_path like '%	estlimit64.exe' or process_path like '%\vmmap.exe' or process_path like '%\vmmap64.exe' or process_path like '%\volumeid.exe' or process_path like '%\volumeid64.exe' or process_path like '%\whois.exe' or process_path like '%\whois64.exe' or process_path like '%\winobj.exe' or process_path like '%\winobj64.exe' or process_path like '%\zoomit.exe' or process_path like '%\zoomit64.exe') and  not ((company = 'sysinternals - www.sysinternals.com' or company = 'sysinternals') or company = 'null'))
